title: When and where can we apply for bus?
content: Fresher joining EC campus this year, where can I apply for bus services? Is it even applicable right now? If not, when can we do so?

comments.body: There was an announcement on pesuacademy regarding this. The online application for bus services for EC Campus opens on 5th july on [PES EC Bus](https://pes.edu/transportation-electronic-city-campus/)
